query:
WITH next AS (
            INSERT INTO organization_activity_counters AS counters (organization_id, last_seq)
            VALUES ($1, 1)
            ON CONFLICT (organization_id)
            DO UPDATE SET last_seq = counters.last_seq + 1
            RETURNING last_seq
        )
        INSERT INTO activity (
            organization_id,
            seq,
            assignee_user_id,
            event_type,
            payload
        )
        SELECT $1, next.last_seq, $2, $3, $4
        FROM next
